content: summertime style comes effortlessly with this light and breezy crochet top in your closet it s a delightful garment that s worked in rounds from the neck down using your best shade of red heart croquette yarn the pretty openwork zigzag stitch pattern is just enough to keep you engaged on this pretty top that s an easy mix n match favorite flattering on a variety of body types this project is offered in a range of sizes for the perfect fit to fit bust measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l/xl 40-46 101 5-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5 xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust xs/s 35 89 cm m 42 106 5 cm l/xl 49 124 5 cm 2/3xl 56 142 cm 4/5xl 63 160 cm
